welcome.title: Welcome to PIR company website
welcome.description: It is no coincidence that you found yourself on the website of a company that cares about the security of its clients. We are a team of professionals with extensive experience. We act effectively and quickly, which is confirmed by the satisfaction and satisfaction of clients with our products and services.

security.title: SECURITY SYSTEMS
security.description: Access control systems, intrusion and robbery alarm systems, and industrial television are responsible for increasing the security of facilities in terms of protecting people and property. These systems ensure that unauthorized persons cannot enter prohibited areas. These systems prevent, inform and supervise facilities. They enable rapid intervention of facility protection at the indicated location.

fire.title: FIRE AND WARNING SYSTEMS
fire.description: Fire warning systems and sound warning systems watch over fire protection of people in office buildings and public buildings. The fire system informs the building management about the occurrence of a threat, while DSO transmits an evacuation message to people in the facility.

bms.title: BMS - BUILDING MANAGEMENT SYSTEM
bms.description: BMS systems serve to optimize service and increase control over the quality of the entire facility infrastructure. The main advantage of these systems is reducing costs while increasing monitoring of all subsystems. This translates into comfort of staying in a given facility.

telecom.title: TELECOMMUNICATION SYSTEMS
telecom.description: Telecommunication systems are the remaining systems that have not been previously classified. These include, among others, intercom installations, video-intercom, intercom, radio and television installations, wireless communication systems, data transmission networks, computer networks and other systems that were created for the proper functioning of the building.

produkty.title: PRODUCTS
produkty.description: Listening to our clients' voice, we don't stop at ready-made solutions. Our company creates applications supporting various security systems depending on the Client's needs.

about.title: About
about.content: PIR company provides assistance in the field of electronic security systems and fire protection. We carry out orders starting from the project itself, through the selection of appropriate devices, system installation and service of the offered telecommunication infrastructure. We focus on continuous development of our employees, which directly affects the high quality of services we provide. We approach each client individually to fully meet their requirements and adapt the offer to their needs. We are unbeatable in our industry, thanks to promoting innovative solutions and professional customer service.
about.closing: Take care of your safety and that of your immediate surroundings.
